text:
[Verse]
Neon dreams in our sight
Walk the streets every night
Shining bright in city's glow
Where we end up we don't know

[Verse 2]
Skyscrapers touch the sky
Cars are rushing flying by
People hustle everywhere
Feel the magic in the air

[Chorus]
City lights city lights
Up all day and all night
City lights city lights
Oh we shine so bright

[Verse 3]
Hear the music feel the beat
Dancing on this crowded street
Lost but found in a crowd
Every voice is singing loud

[Chorus]
City lights city lights
Up all day and all night
City lights city lights
Oh we shine so bright

[Bridge]
Take my hand we'll explore
Every corner every store
Underneath the stars we’ll find
Hidden gems in alleys lined
title: City Lights
